system.purpose: Guides the Vessel Through the Warp, avoiding its dangers.
system.subordinates: Lesser Navigators, bodyguards and assassins, Navigator Emmisaries
system.importantSkills: Navigation (Warp), Trade (Astrographer), Scholastic Lore (Astromancy), Forbbiden Lore (Warp)
system.effect: +5 to Navigation (Stellar) Skill when steering the ship through the warp
